Articles.Content:
I don't have much experience building things so I'm hoping I could get some feedback.

It's a boat.

Modded

![KdAM1R9l.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KdAM1R9l.jpg)

Unmodded

![ofIySp9l.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ofIySp9l.jpg)

[BDArmory Version Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qonbrlvvih3ebrx/MPS%20Clarinet%20BDA.craft?dl=0)

[Stock Version Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/oox2uoh1g724x5n/MPS%20Clarinet%20SC.craft?dl=0)

Top Speed: ~16 m/s

Turning Circle: Big

Mass: Modded: 142t - Stock: 148.6t

Thrust: 3 Basic Jet Engines

Price: Stock: 122 821 - Modded: 151 363

Parts: Modded: 532 - Stock: 710

To operate stock craft:

1 Fires one fore shot.

2 Fires the rest of the fore shots.

3 Front Left Side Cannon.

4 Front Right Side Cannon.

5 Back Left Side Cannon.

6 Back Right Side Cannon.

8 Command Pod Aiming thing.

9 Solar Panels

0 Engines

[Better Buoyancy mod is recommended.](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/464/Better%20Buoyancy)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-09T09:26:26Z" title="04/09/2015 09:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 9, 2015</time> by MegaFlop10**
